revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Afoundry |model=EW1200 |asin=B019DZ1JGG;US; |newegg=9SIAE1U5YN0710 |fcc_date=05/20/2016 |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router |fcc_id=2AHU6-EW1200 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621A |cpu1_cspeed=880 MHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 MiB |ram1=128 MiB |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, populated,, (57600,8,N,1) |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7603E |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;3.10.14;OpenWrt-deriv; |tp_firmware=LEDE |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=AFOUNDRY-2.4G, AFOUNDRY-5.8G-11AC |default_ssid_regex=^AFOUNDRY-2.4G$, ^AFOUNDRY-5.8G-11AC$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=70:3A:D8 |oui_eth=70:3A:D8 }} {{TagLine|AC1200 Wireless High Power Gigabit Router}}
"RM75 V1.1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This is a rather 'premium' router released from this company / this brand. :That being said, the price is still rather high versus other similar offerings from more notable name brand companies. For someone looking for a recent-ish '''MTK''' platform device, it's probably decent.
[https://wigle.net WiGLE] indicates the OUI used by the device (or, more specifically, most common to these default SSIDs) is almost exclusively 70:3A:D8. It's assumed to be correct (and also assumed used by the Ethernet interfaces)..
===External links=== * [https://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=301245 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] : Vendor noted specifications of MT7621+MT7612E+MT7603E * [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=71296 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] : Notes the router as using a custom build of OpenWrt * [http://www.mbreviews.com/afoundry-ew1200-router-review/ Reviewed at '''MBReviews'''] : Notes the default SSIDS as '''AFOUNDRY-2.4G''' and '''AFOUNDRY-5.8G-11AC'''. * [https://git.lede-project.org/?p=source.git;a=commit;h=9b35815f0f0e10125d144c82595bbccbc83d6812 Commit adding support to LEDE] : 16 MiB SPI Flash * [http://denobishackingetico.blogspot.com/2017/07/actualizando-lede-openwrt-based-el.html On a blog]
